settings.title: Our Mission
settings.description: At The Collagen Co, our mission is to help our customers feel confident, radiant, & unstoppable through the transformative power of Collagen.
settings.details: We are committed to providing the highest quality, sustainably sourced collagen products that are both delicious & effective. Whether you're looking to boost your glow, strengthen your hair and nails, or support your overall well-being, The Collagen Co has you covered.
settings.cta_text: Join us on a journey to unlock your full potential & Experience the Glow with The EVOA

settings.title: 3 types of collagen you need to know
settings.subtitle: Of the 28 "types" in the human body, Type 1, Type 2, & Type 3 collagens are the most noteworthy. That is because they make up nearly 90% of all collagens in your body.
settings.type1_description: The most prevalent type of collagen in your body. It is especially abundant in the skin, where it pairs up with elastin to keep your skin resilient, plump, and bouncy. Also found in bones, tendons, ligaments, and other connective tissues.
settings.type2_description: Found in your cartilage-cushy padding that prevents 2 adjoining bones, like in your elbow, from grinding against each other. You can also find Type 2 collagen in your windpipe, voice box, ribs, passages in the lung, and ears.
settings.type3_description: BFFs with Type 1 collagen. That means you would spot Type 3 anywhere you would see Type 1 (your skin, ligaments, blood vessels, & other connective tissues). It may play a crucial role in the body production of Type I collagen.
